name: demon DOIF
description:
THE DEMON DOIF REQUIRES YOUR ASSISTANCE MINION. HE IS HUNGRY. FIND THE ITEMS HE WANTS FROM AMONGST THE PILE. DO NOT GET THEM WRONG.
CONTROLS:

MOUSE TO LOOK.

HOLD DOWN RIGHT CLICK TO GRAB.

LEFT CLICK WHILE GRABBING TO SLAP AN OBJECT.

WASD TO MOVE.

SPACE TO JUMP

HINTS:
THE ROPE CAN BE GRABBED TO RESET THE ITEMS. DOING SO WILL MAKE HIM UPSET.
BOMBS CAN STUN HIM. THIS ALLOWS YOU TO PULL THE ROPE WITHOUT MAKING HIM UPSET.
IF YOU RUN OUT OF TIME YOUR POINTS ARE DOUBLED.
